```coq
intros num_Clients tr h n c.
induction tr as [| x xs IHxs].
- simpl. rewrite last_holder'_unlock_none. auto.
- destruct x as [c' i].
  destruct i as [Locked|Unlock|Lock].
  + rewrite last_holder'_locked_extend. auto.
  + simpl. rewrite last_holder_some_unlock_inv. auto.
  + simpl. rewrite last_holder'_input_extend. auto.
Qed.
